Detailed Description

template<typename T>
struct vector_distance< T >

Vector-distance structure. References a feature vector by its index and its squared distance to another implicit vector.

Implements its own comparison function with the parenthesis operator for STL-based algorithm use.

Template Parameters:
T Type used to encode the distance between two feature vectors. Should be the same than the data from the vectors.
